page.title: 05A DAY ON A FARM NEAR SETTLE
page.content: I get up at{7.30am}and get ready for school. Then I have{breakfast}and at{8.15am}mum takes Alison, Isobel and I down to{school.}I start school at{8.30am}and at{11.35am}I have my school dinner. Then at{3.15pm}mum comes for me then I go{home}and work on the{farm.}I feed the dogs and help dad milk our{30}cows then I have{tea {about 6.00pm.}Then I get my sheep dogs out they are called Jill and Tweed for about one hour and sometimes I watch T.V. At{9.00pm}I go to bed. We have {sheep, cows, bulls and one Shire {horse and foal.}On the 13th July 1985 the Shire horse Rose, won first, second and special prizes at the{Great {Ecclestone show. {JILL PERRINGS,11yrs
